FUMBLES (91-S.Tuitt), RECOVERED by PIT-98-V.Williams at PIT 25. 98-V.Williams to PIT 25 for no gain (68-R.Harris). The Replay Official challenged the fumble ruling, and the play was Upheld. The ruling on the field stands.
